title: Emails: Adding an Image Block
body:
Emails: Adding an Image Block¶

The Image block allows you to add an image to your email.
To use this block, you will need to have navigated to the email design tab. Refer to Designing an Email if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Place an Image block in your email where desired

  2. Click Choose Image and upload your desired image

  3. Alternatively, you can enter the URL of the image under Link

  4. Click the checkbox entitled Show Caption to add a text block that will appear with the image

    • Enter the caption text

    • You can use tokens in your caption and customize the text using the icons in the first row

  5. If desired, change the properties of the image under the Style tab

  6. If desired, change the position of the image under the Settings tab

    • Select Top, Bottom, Left, or Right

    • This option is really only useful when you have opted to display a caption. The image will be positioned relative to this block of text

  7. Click Done
